vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MY_BANK.Collect (patch_3.sol#24-31):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_3.sol#27-30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_3.sol#28)
